sense.def:
An instruction
je nekaj, kar nam nekdo ukaže, da moramo storiti.

seg.quote: She was only following the instructions of her supervisor.

sense.def:
Instructions
so jasni in podrobni podatki o tem, kako naj nekaj storimo.

seg.quote: Read the instructions before you switch on the engine.

sense.def:
Instruction in a subject or skill
je poduk, ki nam ga nekdo da o nekem predmetu ali spretnosti.
